title:
Prescribing positive curvature with conical singularities on $\mathbb
  S^2$
authors: Jingyi Chen, Yuxiang Li, Yunqing Wu
abstract:
For conformal metrics with conical singularities and positive curvature on
$\mathbb S^2$, we prove a convergence theorem and apply it to obtain a
criterion for nonexistence in an open region of the prescribing data. The core
of our study is a fine analysis of the bubble trees and an area identity in the
convergence process.
